messageBody:
I just came accross some code today that was getting trapped into an
endless loop under certain circumstances, it was a simple bug which is
fixed without any tests ( naughty me ), but afterwards I was thinking about
how I would test it, but my brains come to a standing point...

Any simple way of testing these sorts of things? I thought of running the
code in a new thread, and having the test wait for x seconds and if its not
finnished, kill the thread and fail the test, but I'm not sure...

Mark
